profile:
Ramma Foundation Repair is a Quality Edmonton Concrete Foundation Repair Contractor that specializes in Basement Waterproofing. Professional, reliable service since 1971.

We don’t believe in ‘the lazy man’s way we do it right. Our work, professional, precise and efficient, meant to last. Our cleanup is impeccable and our costs are so low you don’t need to take out a second mortgage on your home just to afford professional repairs. We believe in honesty and giving our customers their money’s worth. Our business is committed to our customers and their needs. Saving you money is part of our solution.

Quality and customer satisfaction is our highest priority. If your home is in the need of foundation repair, weeping tile repair or even seasonal rooftop snow removal, you have come to the right place. We will come to your home and make a thorough inspection to determine the cause of the problem and the size of the project and help determine a solution to suit your specific needs. Unlike typical commercial and cost-cutter contractors, Ramma Foundation Repair crew of experienced workers hand-dig all foundation and weeping tile projects to ensure maximum reliability of the repairs without the need for expensive machinery that runs the risk of property damage.

We care about your home. Ramma foundation Repair is a locally owned and operated licensed specialty foundation contractor that offers innovative and guaranteed foundation repair and weeping tile repairs. Headquartered in Edmonton, Alberta we serve the entire Edmonton area including st. Albert, Spruce Grove, Ft. Saskatchewan, Leduc and more. We provide sound and sensible engineered solutions to your foundation problems and weeping tile problems, at incredibly reasonable prices. As a matter of fact, we’re so good at what we do, that unless we took progress photos (which we do on every project), you would never know we were there. If we move the flowerbed, we put the flower bed back. Top-level foundation and weeping tile repair by professionals who care about delivering quality service.
